metadata.Title: CVE-2022-45885 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.0.9. drivers/media/dvb-core/dvb_frontend.c has a race condition that can cause a use-after-free when a device is disconnected.

notes.Note: sbeattie> unfixed upstream as of 2023.01.10 exploiting this vulnerability requires disconnecting a DVB device, which is why this has been prioritized as low.
